name: raoctober day 8 - "a bat going all like, 'yah'"
name_original: raoctober day 8 - "a bat going all like, 'yah'"
description:
I, Zinfandel,  have created  this very, very short experience as an  entry for day 8 of raoctober, following the day's theme, "a bat going all like 'yah'". I hope you enjoy  it.

The up and down arrow keys navigate dialog boxes.  Enter or Escape close dialog boxes. Enter also  selects a choice in dialog boxes if you have the cursor lined up with one.

Once you've decided between [k]eyboard/[m]ouse and [c]olor/[m]onochrome, close the Reconstruction of ZZT information box and press P at the game's title screen to play. I'd say "use the arrow keys to move your player around and walk into things to interact with them", but there won't really be much of that in this one, and I apologize for that.
